website_summaries.verdict: Solid wood hangers that won't snag clothing or break the bank.
pros: These lotus wood hangers have a clear varnish and vinyl covered bar
Each hanger features a chrome hook that turns 360 degrees
cons: Some hangers arrive with loose rods

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take a stand over closet space.
customer_reviews.text: In the past, my wife stole most of my closet space so I made do with folding the majority of my casual clothes. Not anymore. I put my foot down and said enough. I’m taking my closet space back in the Master Bedroom. After 6 days of no physical contact I broke but luckily I married a kind woman and she lets me hang up some of my clothes in the basement closet where these high quality hangers caress my t-shirts, dress shirts and pants without splintering or deforming my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: DWill

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are useless!!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are useless!!! They have one small nail attaching pant rod to top of hanger. DO NOT BUY unless you put very light weight on the lower part of the hanger. Any weight put on lower rod pulls the rod down and the pants fall off of it. How should one attach the pant rod if the small nail doesn't hold the crossbar??? Please advise!!!
customer_reviews.author: fee

customer_reviews.title: Marginal quality control!!
customer_reviews.text: Three of the hangers have quality control issues see pictures. One has a rough spot which would snag clothing, one is broken and makes the pants hanger unusable and one pants hanger looks like it will fall off if used.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Girl

customer_reviews.title: These look and feel good but smell really strongly of varnish
customer_reviews.text: These look good but smell terrible, like varnish. Had them outside for a few hours offgassing, brought them inside and now my husband is commenting that his clothes smell toxic, 2 weeks later. Just got a refund and ordered a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because of the amazing reviews. Starting pulling the hangers out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I bought these because of the amazing reviews. Starting pulling the hangers out of the box and one of the rods on the bottom part of the hanger was already loose and not attached. Another broke when I tried to hang a pair of jeans on the rod part. Also, there were some rough patches on the hanger. Returning unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: mstyle

customer_reviews.title: Half the hangers great, half not.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really liked this product BUT I bought these to personalize as wedding hangers for our wedding and only 9 of the hangers were able to be used for this purpose. The other 11 had rough edges and areas or some other really noticeable flaw in the wood like one had a "chunk" of wood popping out, it was not at all flat and smooth. The 9 that were able to be used were of excellent quality, I just wish the other 11 were like that. I am going to try to fix the unusable ones though because the price of these were very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: SHP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well finished, but reeks of varnish and plastic odors
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you open the box the strong smell hits you. Figured it would dissipate in a few days but after a week in the open I had to toss them out since the smell just would not go away. Other than the smell these look and feel the part. Pity that one flaw made the product completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: V. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t hang any good clothes on them
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t call them “high grade” by a very long shot. They do the job; but be careful. I wouldn’t hang any good clothes on them. The finish is poor. Your clothes will get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: dubya

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 packs of these to try out and liked them enough to order 2 more to switch out ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for wooden hangers mostly because they look so much nicer than plastic ones. Ordered 2 packs of these to try out and liked them enough to order 2 more to switch out the rest of the hangers on this rack. These clothes hang in an open area and I hated how tacky the plastic hangers looked but had been to cheap to buy wooden. I’m glad I did. They look great, feel smooth, no defects or issues. Just received them today so I can’t speak about durability yet. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Sophisticated LOOK
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my hangers that delivered! I ordered 40 hangers on the first shipment. They arrived; neatly packaged and secured. I was so satisfied that I ordered a second shipment of 40 hangers! ***please review my two photos to show you what they look like.*** I hope my experience will give you a peace of mind. Because I am the type of person that must read reviews first before purchasing a product or service, Lol! So, I hope this helps. Thank you to the vendor and supplier for the product and I hope everyone is keeping safe during this pandemic. Be well✨✨✨
customer_reviews.author: La Bella

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Finish That Doesn't Snag Your Clothes
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are fantastic! They seem to be of great quality and look great in my closet. What I really appreciate the most is the nice finish on them. It's smooth and doesn't want to snag your clothes. I had previously ordered an Amazon Basics box of 30 wood hangers - those were not sanded very smooth and there is barely any finish on them. If I'd know how much better these are, I would have ordered these instead. Great quality for the price - I'll be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Half Halt

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for strength
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hanging things that are heavier than the plastic hangers will support. While these are good looking and generally well made according to their design, they are not designed for strength. The bottom bar is set next to the top pieces and nailed with one tiny brad per end. Fortunately for my purpose, the notch intended to hold straps will also hold twine tied around the bottom bar. I’m trying that. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieR

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality hangars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these hangars purchased here. The first set was a success and I wanted more to hang the rest of our heavy coats. The hooks are strong enough to carry the load. Unlike some other comments here, there's been no trouble with hooks pulling out or even getting loose. As for whether or not pants might or might not slip, I'm not using them that way; there is a light ridging along the width of the pants bar so it might do the job quite nicely though I haven't tried.
customer_reviews.author: LightPixie

customer_reviews.title: one issue but overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for wooden hangers that have the non-slip bar. I did not want hangers that had a cut out slot on the hanger but that was what I could find at a decent price. The cut out slots on the hangers are to hang clothing with straps etc. The only issue I have with the hangers is that the cut out slots on the hangers catch on nylon tops and similar materials. They don't catch on cotton or other types of material. I had to gently sand the cut out areas and "soften" the edges so they would not catch on my nylon tops. I also want to add that delivery of the product was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Km

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the notches
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, smooth, well-made wooden hangers. The only thing I have against them, that warranted four stars instead of five, are the stupid notches in the shoulders. I have very few items of clothing that require the notches to keep from slipping off - and my husband has none. I will say that, after looking at EVERY SINGLE example of wooden hangers on the Amazon site, the ONLY hangers that did not have the stupid notches were the ones meant to hold coats - the ones with the big fat shoulders - and some hangers which I already own that are not sturdy enough to hold my husband's heavy clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose hanger.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 30 hangers to try them out. Was so impressed with them, I ordered 60 more. They are light weight but well built. They also have a plastic ribbed sleeve over the pants rail to keep your pants from falling off but not so gripping that its a pain getting on and off. My wife says she wants them in her closet to so looks like I will be ordering more. Would like to have one standard hanger for all our clothes. Looks really nice in the closet to. Like one of those high end closets you see in the movies. :)
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best of the wooden hangars
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different brands of hangars in the same color of wood to see which one would work the best for my closets. Hands down, these are most well made. I had another brand that fell apart immediately and the little brad like nail was all that held the pants bar to the hangar. I'll be reordering these hangars again and not wasting money on the others.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Nancy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, with the test of time, we'll upgrade or downgrade my review
customer_reviews.text: The hangers came well packed, the metal portion of the hanger does not spin. The dowel portion which you hang pants on seems to have a textured film applied to it to inhibit pants from sliding off, but the dowels aren't all uniformly placed in the center, but they don't seem to affect hanging clothes on it so far. The rest of the construction seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the mix of plastic and wire hangers i had, and because I really hate the velvety hangers my wife favors. I'm not hanging heavy outerwear or suits, just shirts, slacks, and a few lightweight jackets and they are perfect for that. I ordered 2 boxes and every hanger was usable and the quality of the whole batch was consistent. for $1.10 each delivered to my door I'm super happy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Iminocca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hangers. My favorite thing is that they're very well made, no splintering of the wood which would catch on your clothing and possibly ruin something. They work so well. My slacks don't slip off of them and they don't make those bumps you can get in the shoulders. Next time I need more I'll order these again.
customer_reviews.author: lilygls

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent wooden hangers. All 20 arrived in perfect condition. I use them primarily to hang button downs and dress pants...for that purpose they work perfectly. You can easily spin the hook at the top to make the hanger face whatever direction you prefer. And, the wood is highly polished and very smooth...it will not interfere with your garment. Furthermore, each hanger looks very similar to the others...which I was concerned about. They look very nice lined up in my closet. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tycoop

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Hanger at its best
customer_reviews.text: You may think a hanger is a hanger, not the case here. These hangers can be used to hang a dress pant, jean, Capri and even a blouse, seater or cami. The weight is super light not adding stress to your closet pole. The option to use it for multiple clothing items helps too. The non slip bar in the middle is not sticky as some of those types of hangers are. The price too, was reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Polignone

customer_reviews.title: excellent hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They really protect your clothes and help keep them in shape. They also gave me a good jump start on cleaning out both of my closets. Many of my clothes didn't seem to warrant these lovely hangers, so off they went to donation. (I have the problem of more space than I need, so don't get rid of enough stuff.)
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but......
customer_reviews.text: I own over 100 wooden hangers that I’ve purchased from different sellers on Amazon but so far these are the best so far. As soon as I took them out of the box I was immediately impressed with the careful packaging and excellent quality for the price. They are beautiful, sturdy and very lightweight compared to all my other wooden hangers. They have a neat plastic covering on the bottom part of the hanger which will help keep my slacks from slipping off. I never write reviews but these hangers deserve one.
customer_reviews.author: AllStar

customer_reviews.title: A Great Hanger...So Far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these hangers for a short while, but the appear to be very well made. I couldn't speak for the durability, since I'm a first-time buyer and haven't had them that long.
customer_reviews.author: KCostelloe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to upgrade my hangers in my closet for a long time and I am so glad I finally upgraded. These hangers are excellent quality and they immediately make my closet look so much more put together. They slide easily on the rod in my closet and I love that the hanger head moves so I can adjust my clothes to all face in one direction without having to take the clothing off the hanger. I just bought two more sets!
customer_reviews.author: Joellen Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little confused when I saw how little the hook was, but it fits perfectly on the rod in my closet and is easy to take on and off the rod. The hanger itself is a really nice quality, smooth, finished wood, I don't expect any snags. Really nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: OwnedByAnArabMare

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality Wooden Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I had seen a lot of mixed reviews on these wooden hangers and was a little skeptical because of the price in comparison to others. When I received these they were all intact and in great shape, there was a slight smell from the varnish/finish on them but it wasn’t pungent and went away within a day. They were smooth and felt like great quality. I placed 3 orders in total and all 60 hangers were of great quality and in great condition. Would def purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good Replica for AmazonBasics
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to Amazon Basics brand since we have some and we like to keep the hangers all the same, but they weren't available anymore. This was the closest I could find in looks. The grain is slightly darker than the Amazon one but can hardly tell the difference unless you look for it. The design is exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine DLR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wooden Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect, sturdy, attractive color, smooth no nicks or rough edges. Also, I live in a 1921 home, bought these for a tiny hall closet; some plastic tubular hangers were too wide and couldn't close the door. These are a perfect standard size- would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: seeks4life

customer_reviews.title: Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two packs of these because I love them so much. They're gentle on my clothes and look great. I wouldn't say they're really light weight and they do take up more room in the closet that a typical metal or plastic hanger but the look is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my new garment rack since most of my clothes are exposed in my room - I wanted them to look nice while on display. Wooden hangers just helped bring a nice aesthetic to my room and makes everything look uniformed and intentional. Hangers seem sturdy since I'm hanging mostly costs.
customer_reviews.author: daria2189

customer_reviews.title: A well made product, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: A well made product. They arrived very quickly. I paused on purchasing these due to the few negative reviews but I had no problems--none had rough wood, there was no varnish smell (no smell at all)--all 20 hangers were perfect. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these hangers, the break really fast. Not able to take the weight, especially jackets!
customer_reviews.author: Rohini R.

customer_reviews.title: They do the job, and they don’t stink...
customer_reviews.text: These seem durable enough, and the quality is there. For the price, I’ve gotten a better looking product, but they’re hangers. Kudos for bundling the hangers in sets of 5 with rubber bands and wrapping the edges with styrofoam sheeting. Nothing was damaged like others have said. Additionally, these didn’t have any sent to them. I steered away from other product based of reviews stating strong chemical smells, like they boxed them before the lacquer finish was dry.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Harassed for review
customer_reviews.text: I don’t give good reviews for people who ask for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wooden hangers at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crafted wooden hangers. We are happy with our purchase. They all arrived well packaged and would make a nice gift for newleweds or those just starting out. They value is exceptional for the price. I would definitely buy these hangers again. I prefer wooden hangers much more over plastic or metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: C. Re-Fowlks

customer_reviews.title: Not just suit hangers
customer_reviews.text: I use these for hanging my jeans and heavy duty Carhartt pants. I use them for all my shirts from the heavy lined flannels to the short-sleeved summer shirts. I'm guessing that if I folded my sweaters they would be fine on these hangers.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting one or two to be defective but not the case. They did smell a little like lacquer when I pulled them from the box but I was expecting that so not a big deal. They worked great to hang up coats that were too heavy for the velvet hangers.
customer_reviews.author: jbeygirls

customer_reviews.title: Different colors
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought these hangers, I ordered the 20 pack and loved them! So I got more. This time I bought the 30 pack. Turns out the 30 pack is a completely different shade of wood. So now I have a large amount of mismatch hangers and I am not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy this product ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Although the quality was excellent, the metal hook is smaller that the average wooden poll that’s in all closets ( I know because I’m a general contractor ) thus, I had to bend each hanger to fit the poll. The manufacturer should know this. Very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit my needs
customer_reviews.text: I like wooden hangers over metal hangers any day. There was a time when the pants bar on the hanger was countersunk into the wood rather than two nails holding it together, they have a tendency to not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred K. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted wood hangers to replace my old plastic hangers. At first I bought a pack of the Wal-Mart brand wooden hangers and they were ”ok”. A few of the wooden rods broke off so I decided to look online for better options. So far these hangers are great! They are strong and sturdy and the wood is really smooth. They are great! I’m very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 240 of these hangers, was hoping I did the right thing, so glad I did, they are a good weight, well constructed, smooth and pants don’t slide. Good value for the money. They came very fast also. 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: christle schaffer

customer_reviews.title: It’s wood. Pretty sturdy, but light weight. Got the job done for me.
customer_reviews.text: That’s a lot of nice hangers for the money! No chemical smell, no busted wood, no splinters, pretty smooth. Sturdy enough. Got the job done for me. I’m not putting them on up for close inspection by my visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control and design
customer_reviews.text: Searching for a nice wood hanger. The dowl rod on the bottom of the hanger to hang pants is heald on with a tiny "nail" and 75% of all of them fall off like mentioned in other reviews. I would not buy again. Very cheap design.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Mac

customer_reviews.title: I will buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: It has non slip lining so the clothes do not slip from the hanger. That is a good addition and I wasn't expecting that. I will buy them again. They look very nice and also feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. They are pretty sturdy and hold up well. I hung a couple of strapless dresses to get out some wrinkles and they hold pretty well. I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyGrand

customer_reviews.title: Nice hangers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and smooth finish like description stated and I like the wood (although the perfectly cut notches are a bit rough and could have done with a bit of light sanding). Also clothes hang closer together on the closet rod & seem to give me a bit more space in closet which is nice. The pant bar that is wrapped in clear, grooved vinyl a grip is nice. However, it would have been nice to know the inside length of the pant bar (which is just 14.25 in), but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom, and she loves them. She told me how good they are and now I need to order a second box of hangers for her and maybe one for me!. The quality of the construction and finishing is very good. I’m interested in the durability so I might update my post later.
customer_reviews.author: nanukgl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality for price. These are very sturdy. I like that the metal hook swivels easily. The only thing I don't like about these hangers is that they are bulky. I purchased them to hang heavier garments, such as winter coats. They are perfect for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!  Love them!  Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, these are wonderful for the price! I love the fact they have gripper ribs along the bottom edge to hold slacks in place, and they can hold up heavy overcoats no problems! One of the best items I have ever purchased. Use them EVERY day!
customer_reviews.author: Robert MacIntel

customer_reviews.title: Solid hanger with good non-slip for pants
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers at a good price. I used to use the wire-clip type pants hanger to keep the pants from slipping, but these hangers do the job really well with the vinyl coating they use on the bar. Also, I like that they are straight and not curved, and therefore take up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Tman

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers so much, I bought two sets and my son bought another set. They are sturdy enough for pants and suit jackets together and make the close look so organized.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wooden hangers. Wood is the best type of hanger and these are well-made ... high quality. Great choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers look and work great! Much better than the cheap plastic hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality and well worth the money. These are soooo much cheaper and better quality than buying at the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: You obviously see the difference between the two sides, one with wooden hangers and the other side with the cheap plastic ones I bought two boxes because I know we have a lot of clothes to organize will definitely buy more to finish
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: Quality hangers. I’ve been slowly replacing all my plastic and wire hangers, so now my closet has a uniform look to it
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my hallway coat closet. Very nice looking. Wanted to switch out from mismatched plastic hangers, because I’ve become a person who appreciate me those details. Overall they seem good quality and sturdy enough for my heavier winter jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Weaver

customer_reviews.title: No more wire hangers!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers, threw away all the wire ones. They hold jeans, slacks, dress shirts, t shirts and coats without fail. Best for the price we could find anywhere. Not a single one has broken or failed in any way.
customer_reviews.author: ShredHead

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these, due to my wardrobe expanding. These are great quality and work well with heavy coats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hanger
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Perfect for slacks, blouses...Well hanging things. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for our new high school band uniforms. I did some research and wanted something that would stand up to the weight of uniforms and be durable enough to withstand high school students. These hangers were a perfect fit. They are economical enough for us to purchase such a large amount at one time and our uniforms look great. We did have some issues with a few hangers breaking, but once I contacted customer service, they immediately sent out replacements. The hangers come with a 5 year warranty and this company backs their product!
customer_reviews.author: SLmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hangers
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about hangers... They do what they are supposed to do, they hold up clothes... They appear to be very high quality especially for the price, I have no complaints what so ever and I would certainly buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: PKliot

customer_reviews.title: High quality, excellent clothes hangers
customer_reviews.text: If maintaining expensive clothes and keeping your closet organized are important to you, then these high-quality wooden hangers are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vito DiPaola

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of varnish :(
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely fantastic (especially at this price) in every way with the exception that it reeks of varnish. I tried cleaning the hangers, and letting them air out, but no matter what the hangers, all of my clothes and even my bedroom would reek of varnish. What a shame. Had to return and opt for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: handsome, sturdy hangers
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid, consistent, light-weight hangers -- and nicely packaged. They are well worth the money. I would have no hesitation buying more, depending on personal need.
customer_reviews.author: cursor

customer_reviews.title: They are every bit the quality  product I hoped they would be, and are as they're described.
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as described. Very pleased with these; I had begun to use the textured thin hangers, but my clothes deserved better, and now my closet has expanded, I have room for the wooden ones again. Thank you for a lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Hermes219

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Wooden Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these hangers for a couple months now and they are holding up as advertised. They are designed well and I'd purchase again when we need more hangers.
customer_reviews.author: TX Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I am using these with all of my coats and they are wide enough for them to drape properly. Well made at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: claywave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hangers, the swivel hook makes the shallow closets in our 120 year old home usable!
customer_reviews.author: R.E. Rawlinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: No more bad "Mommie Dearest" hangers in my closet! This is the second batch of these hangers that I have ordered. They make your closet look so nice and classic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RocksNoSalt

customer_reviews.title: Love the “grooves”
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and sturdiness. My favorite detail are the grooves on each side of the hanger. I can easily hang small strap shirts and it helps blouses from sliding off. Price is good as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Telling the Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good basic hanger
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hanger style. Flat so there's no fuss reversing garments.
customer_reviews.author: Supafrt

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Our store. Sturdy, quality, and like the rubber grips on cross bar.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clothes on the hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers look very nice. Also, they have some special "non slip" features that keep the clothes on the hangers-- even tank tops!
customer_reviews.author: maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Use it to hang heavy field clothing. Great product but plan on getting more than twenty. Usually forty is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Croci

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden hanger
customer_reviews.text: Quality hanger, sturdily built, they are even nice looking. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Artived on time and in great condition. They're exactly as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: Kay D

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for heavy coats!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack of 20, thinking that I wouldn't use all of it, but I really liked the sleek feel of the hangers and they were all sturdy enough to hang some of my very heavy coats! The only downside is that there was a smell when I first opened the box, but now that I've been using them for the past week or so, the smell has completely dissipated.

product_meta.title: High-Grade Wooden Suit Hangers (20 Pack) - Smooth Finish Solid Wood Coat Hanger with Non Slip Pants Bar, 360° Swivel Hook and Precisely Cut Notches for Camisole, Jacket, Pant, Dress Clothes Hangers
feature_bullets: Set of 20 premium lotus wood suit hangers. These luxurious clothes hangers are unlike the rest; made of exceptional quality clear varnished wood with all practical features as a 360 degree chrome hook, a grooved, vinyl covered pant bar, and a contoured shoulder line with perfectly cut notches.

Elegantly hand-crafted from the wood of the resilient lotus tree; these pant hangers have unsurpassed strength and durability. They have been sanded to a smooth, splinter-free finish and coated in clear lacquer for added protection and to bring out the natural woodgrain.

The skirt hangers have a pant bar that allows users to hang pants, skirts, scarves, and more. The pant bar is rounded to eliminate the occurrence of creases and wrapped in a clear, grooved vinyl grip.

A contoured shoulder line on the dress hangers helps clothes keep their original shape; keeping shoulder bulges at bay. The shoulders also feature 2 precisely cut notches for hanging strappy shirts and dresses. A chrome 360 degree hook lets users easily hang clothing from any angle.

Our hangers come presented in secure packaging, great for gifting to loved ones on special occasions such as housewarmings and weddings. Dimensions: 17 ¼” from shoulder to shoulder and 8 ⅞” from top of hook to pant bar.
